title: Gotham Knights and Rocksteady's Suicide Squad Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.24.20
description:
Blessing and Tim join forces to discuss the biggest announcements from DC Fandome including Batman Gotham Knights and Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:05 - Housekeeping
Gamescom Opening Night Live is happening THIS Thursday. You can catch us reacting to it live right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames right after Thursday’s KFGD. It’ll be your regular reacts crew+.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:40 - The DC Fandome Wrap-up
00:18:30 - Did the Gotham Knights trailer help or hurt your feelings about this one being the actual Games as a Service game that we all feared WB to be making? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:32:55 - Curious to hear your thoughts on what the game will be - Best Friends Q:Alex
00:36:26 - Could a new Switch Model arrive early next year? - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:40:45 - Microsoft backs Epic in their battle against Apple - Tucker Higgins @ CNBC
00:47:30 - A HUGE GRAIN OF SALT: Could Halo Infinite drop its Xbox One version? - Sherif Saed @ VG247
00:51:45 -  NZXT
00:53:40 - Klarna
00:54:40 - Bespoke Post
00:56:20 - There’s a new Fall Guys Patch - Jonathan Bolding @ PC Gamer
00:57:15 - Summer Games Done Quick was a success - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:58:02 - Out today
00:59:00 - Squad Up: Jordan Vickers(PS4) - JokerVick
01:00:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Andrea Rene
